info.brief_description: [You play as Violet] Ever since Mom came back from the island, she's been a bit different.
info.description:
You play the character of Violet Parr, daughter of the famed Elasti Girl.
Ever since Dad left on this business trip overseas, something has been different with Mom. She seems to be getting... Curvier? Rounder? Whatever the case may be, it's up to you to figure out what's going on, and decide if you help your mother's changes or surpess them...
